website_summaries.verdict: Bring back a sense of retro styling with this bar stool. Good choice for a unique look that calls back to the early days of rock and roll.
pros: Good amount of adjustability from a simple-looking bar stool
Stool is height adjustable with a simple lever underneath the chair
cons: Retro backing can be uncomfortable to sit on for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: This is a great purchase and you get exactly what as described.
customer_reviews.text: I only purchased one for kitchen initially but the base overwhelmed in a way I didn't like. However, in my breakfast nook, it's a perfect decorative asset that the teens love to sit in-fight to sit in first. However the oldest normally carries the day. I have two teens, two attitudes and two people like sitting in a chair but not cleaning up their dishes or doing chores. Life... PS: 3 minutes to set up. Unlike Ikea products where I have lost years off my life figuring out their stuff. This is a winner
customer_reviews.author: MaherIsALoser

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these chairs because the adjustment height was perfect for our tall bar. After assembly and adjustment to Max height they were very top heavy and easily flip. Our 4 year old would easily tip these sent the 2 back had to pay $15 each shipping even with prime. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dara L. Shafer

customer_reviews.title: A great workbench chair-- lots of height range
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice chair with a good up/down range. The hydralic lift works well and the orange color is fun. I got it to go with my jewelry making work table and it fits well. The only problem with it was the little plastic handle on the lift bar broke off-- but the plastic part is really unnecessary for its operation anyway. We suspect it got cracked during delivery.
customer_reviews.author: plumcreative

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I needed a couple of sturdy adjustable-height stools, and didn't want to spend a lot of money. A year after buying these, they are still going strong -- even when we leave them outside for a while. The little foot rest is nice, and the adjustment works well. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: lhq

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, good price
customer_reviews.text: So Far So Good. Excellent color, sturdy, large comfortable seat. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Bel Canto Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is the crappiest stool you can buy, it’s made out of soda can thin metal and its welds come undone super fast. Bought 5 and have 2 left after a couple months
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Marrero

customer_reviews.title: Gray not silver
customer_reviews.text: Received 4 chairs and assembled them without and issues. The only thing that you want to be aware of is that these are not SILVER they are gray. We have to spray paint them to make them match or I would have given them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Well made good looking chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great. They look very sharp. They work perfectly. We are very happy with them. They are also pretty comfortable-which is saying something for all metal chairs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mcguirk

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and were super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely impressed with the quality for the price. Arrived on time and were super easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, comfortable. My dad uses it in his shop at the lathe or workbench.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Took 5 min. Only one person needed. It's not silver. It's gray !!
customer_reviews.author: Ariela Notzer

customer_reviews.title: Our pump don;t work but, love the stool.
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable pump don't does not work. We kept it as we kept it as we do not need the adjusting part as we need it bottomed out for our application. We love the look.
customer_reviews.author: k. bliss

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It slides up and down smoothly and looks clean and sleek. And it is more comfortable than I thought - I didn't even have to add a cushion as I'd expected.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Well packaged. My husband picked them for our part time apartment. Quality is nice. Grandchildren enjoy them!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Howe

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, looks nice, stable, even on carpet. Only gripe is foot rest is not comfortable in bare feet, so I padded it.
customer_reviews.author: The Green Eagle

product_meta.title: Target Marketing Systems Max Industrial Metal Adjustable Swivel Bar Stool with Arms, Gas Lift, and Foot Rest, Silver
product_meta.description: Color:SilverThe Target Marketing Systems Max Industrial Metal Adjustable Swivel Bar Stool with Arms, Gas Lift, and Foot Rest is a Comfortable and Versatile Piece for Your Home. Perfect for a Home Bar, Kitchen Island, or Outdoor Patio Entertainment Space, the Metal Bar Stool is a Versatile Piece that can go from Room to Room. It can even be used in a Home Office or Bedroom. The Flexibility of the Piece is all thanks to the Height Adjustability of the Stool. Equipped with a Gas Lift Pole and Lever, the Bar Stool goes from 23" to 32" in a Matter of Seconds. Now You are in Control of what Height is the Perfect Height for You. The Metal Bar Stool also comes Equipped with a Full Swivel for Convenience and a Foot Rest. You'll be able to Move Around without Feeling like You're Stuck. Featuring a Rounded Back, Curved Arms, and a Pedestal Base, the Adjustable Bar Stool has a Rustic, Industrial Design. It also comes in a Variety of Colors that give the Bar Stool a Modern Twist. Crafted from a Strong, High Quality Metal, the Swivel Bar Stool is a Sturdy and Durable Piece that will Last for Years to Come. Since 1985, Target Marketing Systems has been Offering Top-Notch Furniture at Affordable Prices. That Goal has not Changed and TMS will Continue to Give You the Best.
feature_bullets: The Bar Stool Measures 18" X 20" X 43" and Weighs 20 Lbs. Arrives with Only Minimal Assembly Required.

Perfect for a Home Bar, Kitchen Island, or Outdoor Patio Entertainment Space, the Metal Bar Stool is a Versatile Piece that can go from Room to Room. Equipped with a Gas Lift and Full Swivel, the Bar Stool puts You in Control.
Featuring a Rounded Back, Curved Arms, and a Pedestal Base, the Adjustable Bar Stool has a Rustic, Industrial Design. It also comes in a Variety of Colors that give the Bar Stool a Modern Twist.
Crafted from a Strong, High Quality Metal, the Adjustable Bar Stool is a Sturdy and Durable Piece that will Last for Years to Come.
Innovation, Quality and Affordability have been Primary Goals of Targeting Marketing Systems Since 1985. Trust TMS to Bring a Practical and Elegant Enrichment to Your Home.
